name: Olive's Expedition
description:
Have you ever wondered what goes on inside your dog’s head?

This modern-day, comedy-based short interactive piece dives into the pupper psyche, and is wholly inspired by one of my sweet doggos, Olive. She’s been quite rambunctious and gotten herself into some wacky scenarios in the past, and in this branching narrative, you can step into the world in her paws! In this story, you’ll em*bark* as Olive, hopping the backyard fence and taking to the streets to explore what the local area has to offer. Based on the decisions you make, you’ll receive one of three tailored endings based on the moods Olive can most often be found in.

All of these scenarios are fictitious but based on how Olive handles her day-to-day life as a wild but precious pup.
